Title: Least Privilege
Plain_Language_Description: Users get only the access they need and admin access is tightly controlled.
Example_Evidence: RBAC matrix, privileged access policy, Just-In-Time (JIT) access logs
Notes: Need to finalize roles and admin groups.

Title: Session Lock
Plain_Language_Description: Systems automatically lock after a period of inactivity.
Example_Evidence: GPO/MDM policy settings, screenshots of lock behavior

Title: Audit Logging
Plain_Language_Description: Enable logging for key security events on systems that process CUI.
Example_Evidence: Log configuration, SIEM settings, sample log exports
Notes: Core systems logging enabled; need to onboard more endpoints.

Title: Log Review & Analysis
Plain_Language_Description: Regularly review logs or use tools to detect suspicious activity.
Example_Evidence: Log review schedule, SIEM dashboards, alert rules
Notes: Decide review cadence and assign ownership.

Title: Configuration Management
Plain_Language_Description: Define and control baseline configurations for systems.
Example_Evidence: Baseline configuration docs, change control records
Notes: Baseline images and change process not formally documented yet.
